entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete all hitcounts ?
entry.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil slette alle optællinger?

entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete all hitcounts for module #(1) ?
entry.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil slette alle optællinger for modulet #(1)?

entry.string: Are you sure you want to delete all hitcounts for module #(1) item #(2) ?
entry.translation: Er du sikker på at du vil slette alle hit-optællinger for #(1)-punkt #(2) ?
